title: 2024 Ferrari Roma Spider at No Reserve
description: This 2024 Ferrari Roma Spider is finished in extra-range Nero Purosangue over Bordeaux leather upholstery, and it is powered by a twin-turbocharged 3.9-liter V8 mated to an eight-speed dual-clutch automatic transmission. Equipment includes a power-operated convertible top trimmed in red technical fabric as well as a fabric-covered tonneau cover, dual-mode MagneRide suspension, 20″ wheels, carbon-ceramic brake rotors, yellow-finished brake calipers, LED headlights, an Advanced Front Driving Camera, airbrushed Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, carbon-fiber boot trim, and quad Sport tailpipe tips. Interior details include heated power-adjustable Daytona-style front seats, a surround-view camera, an 8.4″ vertical touchscreen infotainment system, dual-zone automatic climate control, and a carbon-fiber steering wheel with LED shift lights. This Canadian-market Roma Spider was first registered in British Columbia and was purchased by the selling dealer in 2024 and registered in Washington State. It has 563 miles and is now offered by the selling dealer at no reserve in West Palm Beach, Florida, with factory books, a car cover, a battery charger, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Washington title.
